page.title: 17SUPERNATURAL (CONT)
page.content:
UPP HALL
Upp Hall probably has the largest amount of ghosts in this area they range from malignant poltergeists to harmless apparitions which roam the hall undetected. Perhaps the most bizzare and frightening happenings occur in the kitchen which involves a ghost which lifts kitchen utensils such as knives and cleavers into the air and hurls them around the kitchen when anyone is present. There is also, in one of the bedrooms, a ghost which was bricked up behind the fireplace because her husband wanted to keep her from the outside world. This ghost is said to be heard moaning some nights.
